meanings.definition: Belonging to the very distant past.
meanings.sent1: The ruins of the ancient city were fascinating to explore.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed many ancient artifacts from Egypt.
meanings.sent3: The ancient tree in the backyard was rumored to be haunted.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was as ancient as the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The ancient castle stood tall, a testament to bygone eras.

meanings.definition: Having existed for a very long time.
meanings.sent1: The ancient oak tree provided shade for generations.
meanings.sent2: The ancient tradition of storytelling was passed down through families.
meanings.sent3: The ancient clock in the town square always ran five minutes late.
meanings.sent4: His ancient knowledge of the land guided them safely through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The ancient mountains loomed majestically in the distance.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a time long past.
meanings.sent1: The ancient customs of the tribe were still practiced today.
meanings.sent2: The ancient language was studied by scholars around the world.
meanings.sent3: The ancient recipe for the stew included rare herbs and spices.
meanings.sent4: In her dreams, she wandered through ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent5: The ancient scroll revealed secrets of a forgotten era.
